lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to live their dreams and to provide for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: It's good business.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the specialty agriculture portfolio of a global food ingredients manufacturer.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: This is an excellent way to help end world poverty along with networking online.
lender.occupational_info: I bring together people to pool resources and ideas online for the betterment of all.

lender.name: Adam B.
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone who needs the money more than I do.
lender.occupational_info: I do accounting and finance for a private investment firm.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.loan_because: Because giving and sharing are an important part of who I am.
lender.occupational_info: I am the Executive Assistant to the Chief of Police in our city. I handle his schedule, work with him in preparing documents and letters, and generally assist in the running of the Police Department.

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed in my life. All my need are met, I ahve a wonderful healthy family and I'm so thankful. To whom much is given much is expected. We need to care for others and honor their hard work. This is such an easy thing to do.

lender.name: Edson
lender.loan_because: I believe I can contribute in a small way to a better world by giving others a chance to succeed. I think the idea of being able to "recycle" my funds is great way to do this.
lender.occupational_info: Retired and I contribute 2 days a week as an Animal Care Volunteer at the Arizona-Sonora Desert Museum.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who sincerely need and want help. I believe that these people will take what little we give them and do the real hard work themselves to change their lives.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to build and maintain a small business and wanted to help women in other areas of the world have a chance at success just like I did!
lender.occupational_info: I have been in business for 20 years helping my clients financially plan for the present and the future. I am very greatful for all of the great friendships I have develped over the years and am now planning my own retirement which will begin at the end of this year.

lender.name: Asia/Grant Services-TRF
lender.loan_because: The work we do helps those in need and to give money and hear from the beneficiaries will make a difference in our day to day work.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurs can change their communities for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I am an independent software developer. I work with nonprofit, for profit, small and large businesses.

lender.name: marian
lender.loan_because: A little of my money can have a huge result for someone else. In my world it is easy to give myself another sweater or a new pair of shoes and this money I spend on myself will have no long term effect; however, a small loan via KIVA can change someone's tomorrow. My resolution for 2008 is to give to others as often as I give to myself.
lender.occupational_info: At Purdue University, I coordinate as a volunteer a collection of framed and matted prints that faculty and staff can borrow (like a book from the library) for 12 to 36 months to hang in their campus office or work areas. This program is a wonderful way to add color and beauty to our campus.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I want to help women become self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I was a teacher in public schools for 35 years.

lender.name: RON
lender.loan_because: Monies makes the world go around for those who know how to use it

lender.name: WIT-NC
lender.occupation: Women in International Trade, Northern California
lender.occupational_info: Women in International Trade - Northern California (WIT-NC) is a non-profit organization founded in 1989. WIT-NC has been a trusted resource for the San Francisco Bay Area, providing programs, training and education in global trade to local trade professionals. As an active force in the international trade community, WIT-NC works to expand business skills and public awareness of international trade issues.

lender.name: Graham
lender.loan_because: it feels good...sometimes all people need is a chance.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world, obtain loans that can change lives. Thank You KIVA! :) I heard a news story on NPR about a lady who received a small loan to buy cell phones. She then rented out the phone time for a huge profit. It changed the lives of everyone in the village. This mother was able to provide for her kids and send them to school, which is a luxury for her village.

lender.name: Garage Productions
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference and to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Print and web design services.

lender.name: Anne-Marie
lender.loan_because: I think that dignity is one of the most serious poverties in this world: " I don't need charity, I need to be offered a chance to make a life for myself!"
lender.occupational_info: I help guests have a lovely meal and a special night out!

lender.name: Anthony
lender.loan_because: It makes the world go around.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English in Korea.

lender.name: Gina
lender.loan_because: There is no happiness in having or in getting, but only in giving” - Henry Drummond
lender.occupational_info: I design custom storage units for closets to help people organize their belongings.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: It's a good way for people in developing countries to both help themselves and also their communities
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses become more efficient and profitable

lender.name: CARLOS
lender.loan_because: I can. And yes, it feels good!
lender.occupational_info: Dreaming it could happen...

lender.name: Next Plateau Consulting
lender.loan_because: Small businesses and entrepreneurship have made our country great and I believe they can make the difference in other parts of the world as well.
lender.occupational_info: Helping private business owners with tax, legal and finance issues so they can concentrate on being successful in their chosen trade.

lender.name: Kay & Jim
lender.loan_because: To help other entreprenuers without the same opportunites for raising capital as we have here in the US. To share our good fortune so others will succeed and share theirs.
lender.occupational_info: We are like most others in the Kiva program, entreprenuers. We started our business in the garage, and 25 years later have grown to over 40 employees,

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I started a business several years ago and I know that capital is important to make a business successful. I hope, in a small way, to add to the success that these business men and women will have.
lender.occupational_info: I manage my client's investment portfolios.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: It is a sustainable way of helping others and it is transparent for the lender.
lender.occupational_info: Technical assistance for companies in developing countries contributing to sustainable economic development

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: We are so fortunate in our country to have so much. KIVA opens a unique doorway for discussion on different countries, cultures and ways of life. To be able to help in a small way with this type of “investment” is such a positive example for our children.

lender.name: Sofia
lender.loan_because: I want to make a diffrent.

lender.name: Theresa M.
lender.loan_because: it is a good thing to do and I can do it safely
lender.occupational_info: I take care of the elderly in their homes or in the hospitals. I also teach people to swim because I believe in the importance of exercise and this is an exercise which can be done by anyone regardless of age, or mental or physical abilities

lender.name: In memory of Gaye Sims
lender.loan_because: I lost my loving wife at the too young age of 43 due to Cancer. Gaye always taught me to help others. This is a very small tribute to my soul mate.

lender.name: Storey
lender.loan_because: We know what a difference one to one interactions can make. We want to be a part of making the world a friendlier and more equitable place.
lender.occupational_info: We have a commercial real estate broker, a political consultant, a volleyball coach, a restaurant owner and a sushi chef in this family. Also 2 college students.

lender.name: Wayne
lender.loan_because: It's the age old "giving fish" versus "supporting a fishing venture" argument

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I want to do my part to help people across the world persue their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I manage computer and telephone systems for large companies.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the opportunity to support their family, provide education for their children, and do something they are interested in.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.occupation: Lover of travel, food, wine, friends, family, dogs

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I think this is one of the best ways to support others. I really like the Kiva concept, and I´m proud to be a part of your work! Thank you!
lender.occupational_info: I´m working with global marketing for the company Logosol, the world’s biggest seller of portable sawmills.

lender.name: Eva
lender.loan_because: I love giving people a hand up instead of a hand out. It makes the world a better place each time someone who was down and out improves their life. I feel like Kiva gives me the opportunity to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are in crisis. For example someone who is going through a divorce or who has lost their job, or who doesn't like their job and wants to change but doesn't know what they want to do. I teach them how to find the strength within themselves to move forward and feel good about their life and themselves. It is very rewarding.

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because: Free market capitalism is the key to PROSPERITY!

lender.name: Owen
lender.loan_because: Imagine the possibilities....

lender.name: Team PSI
lender.loan_because: You gotta pay it forward and a little bit of kindness goes a long long way.
lender.occupational_info: We complete background checks on potential employees & tenants.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: Implementing microfinance programs in poverty-stricken countries is one of the most empowering ways to encourage community growth and development.
lender.occupational_info: I am a representative of our beloved communities. My work with children and families encourages community development and unity through understanding, giving and accepting.

lender.name: Kent Stephan Jensen
lender.loan_because: Kiva.org is facilitating one of the best ways to help other people I can imagine.
lender.occupational_info: I have a wonderful job at Saatchi & Saatchi Copenhagen.

lender.name: Adil
lender.loan_because: I love the idea, never had the opportunity to participate in such a thing
lender.occupational_info: Business consulting in Paris, helping companies improve their processes

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I like encouraging entrepreneurship, especially in regions that need the extra aid.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student. Learning how to become an entrepreneur.

lender.name: Jennifer Howse
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I sell homes to people.

lender.name: Tess
lender.loan_because: “We ourselves feel that what we are doing is just a drop in the ocean. But the ocean would be less because of that missing drop.” - Mother Teresa

lender.name: Laila
lender.loan_because: To see other people sucess with their lifegoals makes me very happy! As a nurse it is my way in life to help people that needs help! I hope all people thinks like me!
lender.occupational_info: I think the word nurse speak for itself.

lender.name: Célia & Daniel
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lender.name: Brian & Susan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to succeed. We've been blessed with many opportunities that have helped us in our careers. We choose to show our appreciation for our blessings by providing opportunity for others.
lender.occupational_info: Brian and Susan met while working on the production of corporate marketing events. Brian is now at Microsoft working on corporate events for their executives. Susan has her own small business consulting firm.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to be successful in life, so these loans are made to help others provide all the needs for their families. These loans are in honor of my wonderful mother, BJ - Merry Christmas, Mom!
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired and make glass beads at a torch in my basement studio. I make jewelry with the beads and sell it locally. I hope to get my website more interactive soon to sell my jewelry.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I want to support the people of Nicaragua.

lender.name: Kriss
lender.occupation: Executive Director - Center for Social Innovation

lender.name: Christopher & Aleiva
lender.loan_because: I can. Simple as that. If I can help, I should.
lender.occupational_info: Designing and measuring the success of advertising.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: If you give a person a fish they eat for a day. If you teach a man or woman to fish you feed them for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: I help people fix up their homes.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I believe strongly in helping people to help themselves.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I love to help people! It gives me joy.
lender.occupational_info: Stay at home mother of 2.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I can be part of the solution in helping someone lift themselves and their families up out of poverty by giving them an opportunity.

lender.name: Karen
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Al J.
lender.loan_because: "I don't know what your destiny will be, but one thing I know: the only ones among you who will be really happy are those who will have sought and found how to serve" Albert Schweitzer

lender.name: Zoe
lender.occupational_info: I perform whatever duties my bosses need: answering the phone, making purchases, buying lunch, keeping track of expenses and paying taxes.

lender.name: EO Smith DECA
lender.loan_because: DECA is an international organization that helps students improve their leadership skills, focus them toward careers and instill a civic and social understanding of our world. That is why KIVA.org is such a great oppurtunity for our members to learn more about less fortunate entrepeneurs and gives us the oppurtunity to help them.
lender.occupational_info: We are all high school students. DECA is an after-school club that we participate in to learn more about business and the community.

lender.name: Barbara, Maarten & Alex
lender.loan_because: it's a way to tangibly help others to help themselves. I see concrete results of to whom and how the dollars we contribute go to empower others in a sustainable way--what could be better?

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: A lot of lifes good fortune can be attributed to where you were born. I have travelled extensively around the world and it never ceases to amaze me how engaging human beings can be, rich or poor. I am extremely impressed with the Kiva organization and intend to continue making loans whenever I can.
lender.occupational_info: My work brings me into close contact with people in a very personal way. Buying a home remains the single largest purchase most people will ever make and it's very gratifying to assist people to make this experience come true

lender.name: Sara Beth
lender.loan_because: I want to help women who I otherwise could not touch.
lender.occupational_info: I am an attorney but i now run two trusts. these trusts pay people who have asbestos illness related to two different companies in California, Minnesota and North Dakota, all states here in the U.S.A,.

lender.name: GregRobin
lender.loan_because: it does some good. Money, without purpose, is wasted (see Benjamin Franklin www.goBENgo.info & www.ben-franklin.org).
lender.occupational_info: I am a story teller. I portray the character, thoughts and experiences of people like Benjamin Franklin so audiences can ask questions of that famous person. Called "Chautauqua" (sha TA kwa) it allows people to interact with history and understand better how important the past is to us today.

lender.name: Pinnacle Performance Grp
lender.loan_because: Our mission is to help people around the world work smarter. We believe that one of the ways that entrepreneurs can work smarter is to invest in their businesses. Our loans help these dedicated business people invest in what they need to be successful.
lender.occupational_info: Our company creates training programs that teach employees how to do their jobs.

lender.name: Wendi
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed and want to give other people (moms) a chance to provide a better life for their families.

lender.name: robert
lender.loan_because: why not
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers helping people to access the internet from their places of business.

lender.name: Azadeh and Ethan
lender.occupational_info: Azadeh is a Ph.D. candidate in social work, her research focuses on adolescent treatment engagement in community mental health. Ethan is a Ph.D. candidate in cell biology, his research focuses on cell motility and wound healing.

lender.name: Stephen James
lender.loan_because: This is one way to help others, and to do something for people that is truly meaningful, for the lives of people around the globe. sjf
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired gentlemen, who is attempting to do something positive for other people, where ever they may reside in this world.

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: My uncle gave me the money to try it out.
lender.occupational_info: I'm 7 years old. I do math at school and help my mom with a lot of things. I play the piano. I like helping people. I want to have glasses. The glasses in the picture are just pretend. My birthday is in August.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who are trying to make a better life for themselves and their families

lender.name: Yong-Nam
lender.loan_because: It's nice to be able to help people!

lender.name: Nicky
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed by circumstance and so many others have not.

lender.name: Duc & Nguyet
lender.loan_because: Every one of us will need help at some point in time.
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor taking care of women and delivering babies.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I can and it's up to us all that can to give back in some way. I found this avenue most amazing and I always pull for the little guy or girl.

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help others if I can.
lender.occupational_info: Look after equipment data and maintenance schedules on a computer system.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I might be thosands of dollars in debt myself from school, but my life has been cushioned for a while and probably always will be. I want to help and Im so glad there's an orginization out there excepting small donations and loans!

lender.name: Lorenzo, Lori y Familia
lender.loan_because: el Dios says love thy neighbor (regardless of age, race, gender, nationality or religion)!
lender.occupational_info: Just trying to help where we can......

lender.name: Chris Muschong
lender.loan_because: All people on this planet have the same desires, no matter the country. This web site makes it just as easy to loan to someone on the other side of the planet, as it is to loan to someone down the street.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: I believe in the micro lending concept's ability to help where mainstream bank do not.
lender.occupational_info: My work is like choosing good seeds and taking care of them for a few years until they grow strong enough to survive on their own. It takes a lot of patience because it's a marathon, not a sprint.

lender.name: Sarbjit
lender.loan_because: I would like to help others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Genentech which is part of the Roche organisation .

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: These hardworking people deserve a chance....for a better life, for opportunities for their children. As a parent, I strive to set an example for my children. I wish for them the gift of knowing how rewarding it is to help those less fortunate. I want them to know that they CAN make a difference...and we are.
lender.occupational_info: I work part-time as a finance/accounting consultant.

lender.name: Audrey& John
lender.loan_because: I was given a Gift Cert . as a Christmas present ,by my daughter ,and I was delighted to be helping someone get started in business.

lender.name: Sandi
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed in many ways in my life. If I can help those in other areas of the world in even small ways, I consider it a privilege.
lender.occupational_info: I work part-time with my art projects and also part-time as a meeting planner and administrtaive assistant. I am also a member of the Board of Directors for our local Animal Shelter.

lender.name: Tony
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: McKee
lender.loan_because: The children are learning it really is better to give than to receive.
lender.occupational_info: This group of children were given this donation in lieu of Xmas gifts at our annual Christmas party to help another family.

lender.name: Ken Chan
lender.loan_because:
I believe in sustainable capacity building, and that the best gift of humanity one can offer to another thousands of miles away is hope and opportunity.
I travelled to Ecuador in June '07 as part of a World Council of Credit Unions delegation, and saw first hand how micro credit has improved the lives of local entrepreneurs. The photo you see here is that of Margarita. I visited her farm outside the town of Nabon. With the help of micro loans from Cooperativa de Ahorro y Credito Jardin Azuayo, Margarita and her husband Geranomo were able to build a small chicken and guinea pig farm. She is now able to send her two older children to college and her younger daughter (pictured here) to primary school.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked in various levels of government in both Canada and the United Kingdom. I am now running for Toronto City Council in the 2010 elections.

lender.name: Tim / Kelsey
lender.loan_because: i know that it is the right thing to do and that only 25 dollars can change someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: we loan because we want to.

lender.name: Curt
lender.loan_because: Social justice...helping out your neighbor...we are all neighbors.

lender.name: INTRUST GROUP
lender.loan_because: We care.
lender.occupational_info: We run IT departments for companies.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: Because people need a hand up.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with cancer manage their illness

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe in the concept of "Pay it Forward"
lender.occupational_info: Helping to run and fund a teaching hospital

lender.name: Jami
lender.loan_because: The Lord has blessed our family and we want to be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: Challenging, exciting, meaningful, ever changing, and full of love.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I believe that the best way of helping people is by enabling them to help themselves.

lender.name: Han
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance...

lender.name: Gudea
lender.loan_because: What goes around, comes around!

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I have seen the successes that can arise from microlending and feel privledged to be able to contribute to the projects of my friends abroad.

lender.name: Iris
lender.loan_because: I want to participate in lifting others out of poverty. Life is about giving back and helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Manage sales partnerships and relationships with senior executives of high technology companies.

lender.name: eddie
lender.loan_because: give someone a chance for better life

lender.name: Melyssa
lender.loan_because: I was fortunate enough to be born into Western Civilization. The distribution of wealth in the world is ridiculous. Just $25 can go so far for so many in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Engineer for an Oilfield Services company. My role is in Operations Support.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I want to help empower others. I am particularly interested in providing support to women and children. I know that we are often overlooked as talents and resources. I also know that women make the best decisions in terms of spreading the wealth and improving a larger group. I am fortunate that I am able to help others. My small contribution through this wonderful organization goes a long way and can make a huge difference to deserving entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I worked with computers as an engineer then in marketing, sales and management. My strength is in managing projects. I will soon begin a company and I pray that the support I wish for all others is sent my way,

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Christ has called us to serve others and this is a way we can do that across the world
lender.occupational_info: I am in financial services and my wife is a teacher

lender.name: Felix
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do....

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I don't think the world bank or the imf know what they are doing sometimes
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I loan to give someone a chance to pursue a dream and lifestyle that they believe in. It's all about caring and helping your neighbor.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an engineer officer serving in the US Army....

lender.name: Rajat
lender.loan_because:
I want to be part of Positive Change in someone's life. Its a great feeling.
I am thankful to KIVA for providing this opportunity.

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: ...just because :)

lender.name: ivey
lender.loan_because: i think this is a great idea--- a way to help someone get what they need to make their dream come true.
lender.occupational_info: i started a janitorial service business 26 years ago with $50.

lender.name: Daniel DiGriz
lender.loan_because: “Not to enable the poor to share in our goods is to steal from them and deprive them of life. The goods we possess are not ours but theirs.” – St. John Chrysostom
lender.occupational_info: As an entrepreneur, I help small businesses grow through internet marketing, and I help other small businesses grow through micro-lending with Kiva.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a "leg up" at least once in their life.
lender.occupational_info: I repair what is broken, I build what is needed, I help when I am asked.

lender.name: Lubos
lender.loan_because: It is an awesome idea and It feels good to help other people to improve their lifestyle quality.

lender.name: The Ellis Family
lender.loan_because: I want to take a risk to help give someone their chance to suceed. When I started my business someone took a chance and trusted in me. It changed my life, and now I want to do the same.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I fully support the micro loan ideology. We feel very strongly about providing a helping hand and not just a hand out. Helping an entrepreneur in need helps not just that person but, in the end, the hundreds or thousands of people in that entrepreneur's community who benefit indirectly and substantially from their ambition.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites for the Department of Defense and my wife works in education for the University of Virginia.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: Talk less, Do more.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I feel that everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: Juan
lender.loan_because: I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the technology infrastructure (computers, networks) of a bank.

lender.name: NEXUS
lender.loan_because: Making a difference!
lender.occupational_info: Entertainment Technician

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: "If you give a man a fish, he'll eat for a day, ...if you teach him how to fish he can eat for a lifetime"

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: When I first heard about Kiva I thought, what a brilliant idea! I love the fact that in my own small way I am helping someone improve their standard of living. And the fact that I know that those I choose to help out are actually reveiving all of the funds.

lender.name: Lindsley
lender.loan_because: It pleases me to be able to directly help people, I learn about experiences, the business owners are inspiring, it connects me to other sponsoring partners and to beneficiaries of the loan, and KIVA is a marvelous program of giving. I'm glad I learned about KIVA through President Clinton's book.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who are trying to help themselves.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I believe in the pooling of funds to achieve something together that we could not easily do alone. Also, it makes me feel good to help.
lender.occupational_info: I organize group investments in real estate in California and Texas.

lender.name: Sonnie
lender.loan_because: to give to the poor and needy was taught by Jesus Christ. I am personally blessed and live in a country that has it all!. It is my PLEASURE to be a part of KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: I have a full time job, but, I also do small business consulting. It's wonderful to be a part of someone else's success.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to help industrious people with limited opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Retired commercial real estate acquirer and builder.

lender.name: Gary & Linda
lender.loan_because: it gives others the opportunity to improve their lives and we feel that we have been richly blessed and want to share with others.

lender.name: Kin
lender.loan_because: I like to help other people to make a difference in their lives

lender.name: Ramon
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: I love my children and I'd do anything to make their lives better. That's why I believe in the people I sponsor. They want better lives for their children too.

lender.name: william
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people and would rather give a helping hand than a hand out this keeps a persons dignity intact with self esteen

lender.name: Adam

lender.occupational_info: Jack of all trades, master of none.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because:
I want to help people who are less privileged build a better life for themselves.
Lending people money they pay back will give them a sense of accomplishment that they succeeded through hard work rather than a handout. It also allows the same funds to be used again and again to help multiple families.

lender.name: Skyblue
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Chris

lender.name: Hermanas Locas
lender.loan_because: In honor of my sisters - the most amazing people I know.
lender.occupational_info:
The Baugher Sisters:
me (Barbra): I go to school where I am learning about government and nonprofits organizations - I want to make the world a better place for everyone. I am married and I have one son named Cameron.
Becca: Becca works at an elementary school taking care of children with special needs. She is married and has four daughters - Madison, Leighia, Karynne, and Juliana. Becca is kind, thoughtful, and takes care of everyone - she is a great mom!
Beth: Beth works in human resources at a university. She is married and just recently had a baby girl, Gabrielle Alese. Beth is really good at making people laugh and offers great advice.
Bonita: Bonita is in the Air Force. She is currently stationed in Tucson, Arizona. She recently returned from being stationed in the Middle East, and is happy to be back with her husband and their son, Landon. She is also a photographer. Bonita is extremely smart and creative.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I want to share in blessing others, especially women, as they care for those they love. There are times we each need a hand extended, not a hand out ,which is why I believe in Kiva's mission!
lender.occupational_info: I teach sixth graders science and the wonders of this world.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I think everyone is deserving of a quality life.

lender.name: charlie
lender.occupational_info:
We can handle income tax matters for individuals, couples, families and small business owners or professionals.
The objective of every tax return preparation and income tax planning engagement is to ensure you pay the lowest possible tax allowed by the tax rules this year and in future years, so your assets can grow. With 24 Hour Tax & Accounting you will know your reporting is correct and on time.
Your tax liability will be as low as legally possible. You can be assured that 24 Hour Tax & Accounting monitors the latest tax rulings that might affect your return. Come by, call or email us today for information regarding our services and options and one of our staff will get back to you.
Taxes & Consulting Competitive Rates Professional Service Auditing

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: Unfortunately and with regret, I too will be withdrawing my funds from KIVA as they are repaid. KIVA lenders have repeatedly asked the KIVA administration to remove loans that involve cockfighting, but they refuse to do so. I understand that there are cultural differences, but animal cruelty is animal cruelty. I have been a KIVA member for three years, spoke VERY highly of KIVA and have recruited other people as well, so it is with a heavy heart that I will no longer be supporting KIVA.

lender.name: jackie
lender.loan_because: my mother and i started our business with the support and help from our friends. we truly started with very little, and now run a very successful business. I want to give someone the same help and support. Hard work really does pay off...
lender.occupational_info: I run a family business serving others.

lender.name: maizefarmer
lender.occupational_info: I am a maize breeder

lender.name: Birgitte Victoria
lender.loan_because: I think this is such a good idea. I feel good about these loans. A small amount for me can mean a lot to others. Why shouldn`t I help.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a theatre. I also work in film and television. I love my work, but more than that I love my children, I have three.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I'm interested in helping those who lack the means but have the will and work ethic to improve both their lives and the lives of their loved ones.
lender.occupational_info: I'm responsible for the safe and timely movement of freight trains.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.occupational_info: to advise and invest in entrepreneurial & nonprofit organizations

lender.name: neuber.com
lender.loan_because:
We loan because lots of people have helped up build one of the largest databases of Windows processes, files, spyware and rootkits on http://www.neuber.com/.
We want to pass their help on to people who really need it.
We are donating $1 for each new user comment left at http://www.neuber.com/taskmanager/process, because as each user comment helps us build a more valuable website, we in turn want to extend our help to hard-working people around the world so that their dreams may come true.
We loan without expecting a payback. A payback is a bonus, and will go to help another family.

lender.name: Nuno
lender.occupational_info: i wanna spread the informal learning strategies in organizations.

lender.name: Dey
lender.loan_because: it's a great way of helping people help themselves to make a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I have my own consulting business, and my clients are mainly government departments, universities and large corporates. I help them improve the usability and accessibility of their websites by doing research, design and evaluation activities.

lender.name: LaBinka and Clarence
lender.loan_because: God has really blessed and keep on blessing my family,so why not help others.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It'sa great way to have a direct impact on the lives of the people who are financially poor but rich in ideas that lead to self sufficiency.

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: we're all in this together

lender.name: colette
lender.loan_because: I am coming from a very poor family. All my life, I had the chance to meet people that helped me without knowing it…. It is time to give back… If I can make the difference and help someone achieving their dreams once in my life without getting anything in return, then I can say mission accomplished.

lender.loan_because: These people deserve support for their entrepreneurial initiative and mostly cannot get funded otherwise. I believe sharing can be very powerful and we need to improve this social skill in the West.
lender.occupational_info: I am helping businesses save money while fulfilling their obligations to control and limit emissions, which is done to reduce climate change worldwide.

lender.name: Kosta
lender.loan_because: I love to see people succeed & occumplish their dreams just like I did. I loan without expecting a payback. Payback is a bonus and it will go to help another family. Love & compassion for others starts with self-worth & self-love. Success in what we do pushes us to give back what we feel.
lender.occupational_info: Create TV/Radio/Print advertising & produce Web sites/Marketing materials for mid to large companies.

lender.name: OLOL School, U City
lender.loan_because: These loans were made to honor the teachers and staff at this wonderful school. I know they would love the idea of creating a domino effect of good. Merry Christmas!

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I want to help others
lender.occupational_info: College Professor

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: When you dig another out of their troubles, you find a place to bury your own. ~Author Unknown
lender.occupational_info: We make a living by what we get, we make a life by what we give." ~Winston Churchill

lender.loan_because: I saw how peoples lifes can be change with just a little help. I am so happy to be have found Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I build and repair computers.

lender.name: linus
lender.loan_because: some people real do need a help to get on their feet.

lender.name: gregory
lender.loan_because: I like to make a difference in people's lives. I am truely blessed in my life and I believe in paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: The more I help people the more I learn that it is better to give then to receive (the smile on someone's face is priceless) please pay it forward and remember to always give thanks to the LORD.

lender.name: Tiina
lender.loan_because: This is great opportunity to help people to get "better" life.

lender.name: serena
lender.loan_because: My God has blessed me abundantly and I have been to Tanzania this year and have seen the great need.
lender.occupational_info: I assist the dentist to meet the needs of the patients we see. We are a general dental practice but also specialize in cosmetic dentistry.

lender.name: LaTrice
lender.loan_because: The needs of others helps put the world around me into perspective.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can. I know how hard it is in these countries to make a living. If everyone that could, would, what a difference it would make in our world.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: After being in Kenya and Tanzania this spring I wanted to do something to help the people of these countries and Kiva has given me the way to do this.

lender.name: Diana & Larry
lender.loan_because: Kiva has taken a complex problem and given a simple solution to all of us who want to help. Now, finally, when we pool our resources, we can make a difference.

lender.name: Emeka Samuel
lender.loan_because: I loan in order to help the poor and as well impart positively in the lives of people for a better tomorrow.
lender.occupational_info: Am simple,kind,caring,humble,and decent human being that devote and dedicated to my assigned duties.I want every one to help to change the world to be a better place for all of us to live,I am the Initiator/Coordinator - National Youth Empowerment Initiative-founded in 1998,President-Amigo Youth Forum Okoko Item - A Community Youth Organization - Founded in 2003,Member-Taking It Global Organization and Abia State Coordinator -The Love Foundation Nigeria Inc.U.S.A a non profit,non governmental organization that encourage all youths academically,connect them socially,support them financially,strengthened them with working opportunities,support them with strong moral character and educate youths on the danger of H.I.V/AIDS virus and other diseases,train and support those that lack sufficient learning/working opportunities, Initiate,Support and embark on any useful projects that will benefit our Communities and Globally, Patron-Abia 1, Aba District and 2nd Aba Company of Boys/Girls Brigade Nigeria of Christ Methodist Church Nigeria -21/25 Market Road,Aba, Abia-State in 1998 and presently The Local Lead Agency for Global Youth Action Network U.S.A on Global Youth Service Day 2005 and 2007(GYSD)
